caption.p: Terminal bud development at different temperature regimes. a Terminal bud scale with rudimentary lamina at continuous pre-dormancy low temperature (12/12 °C). b Detail of rudimentary lamina. c Terminal bud formation at continuous high temperature (24/24 °C); the scales are green. d Post-flushing elongated stem at continuous high temperature (24/24 °C). Brownish bud scales decorate the stem. Sc, scale; La, rudimentary lamina; Lf, leaf
